import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; const Home = () => { const [data, setData] = useState([]); const [chrisna, setChrisna] = useState(""); const [Charlotte, setCharlotte] = useState(""); const [Anggi, setAnggi] = useState(""); const [Sophia, setSophia] = useState(""); const [Emily, setEmily] = useState(""); const [Violet, setViolet] = useState(""); const [William, setWilliam] = useState(""); const [Lucas, setLucas] = useState(""); const [Henry, setHenry] = useState(""); useEffect(() => { fetch("http://localhost:3001/api/get/schedule") .then((response) => response.json()) .then((data) => { setData(data); }) .catch((error) => { // Tangani error jika permintaan gagal console.error("Error fetching data:", error); }); }, []); const styles = { backgroundImage: `url(${process.env.PUBLIC_URL}/BG2.jpg)`, backgroundSize: "1120px", backgroundPosition: "250px", height: "648px", // Ubah tinggi (height) sesuai kebutuhan Anda }; return (
Information
Todays Schedule
{data.map((item, index) => ( ))}
Name Teacher Time
{item.Name} {item.Subject} {item.Timein} - {item.Timeout}
); }; export default Home;
